quick_chat.name: Quick Chat
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.quick_cha: Send messages quickly with a key press.
quick_chat.config.message.desc:
Set the content for quick message sending

Prefix the content with "/" to execute it as a command
quick_chat.config.anti_false_contact.des: When enabled, messages sent via quick keys or the quick message list in the chat bar require a double-click to send, preventing accidental activation
quick_chat.config.message_list.desc: You can add more quick messages here. In-game, you can quickly open this screen via key binding and send the content you want!
quick_chat.config.cooldown.desc: If disabled, the cooldown duration will be set to 0.5s
quick_chat.config.cooldown_duration.desc: Set the interval duration between message sends
quick_chat.config.chat_button: Quick Message List in Chat Bar
quick_chat.config.chat_button.desc: If enabled, the chat bar will list quick messages, allowing you to send them quickly by clicking these buttons
quick_chat.config.chat_button.width.desc: Set the width of the quick message buttons in the chat bar
quick_chat.gui.message_list.title: Quick Message List
quick_chat.gui.message_list.tip_empty: No messages available, please add new messages!
quick_chat.gui.message_list.tip: Select a message to delete, edit, or send it!
quick_chat.gui.message_list.send_not_in_: Please enter the game before using this feature!
quick_chat.gui.add_message.title: Edit Quick Message
